Fostering economic freedom

Zeppelin is a technology company focused on improving how value is exchanged in the world using blockchain technology and infrastructure.

Clients, partners and platforms

Over the years we’ve gained the trust of other leading technology companies, partners, and investors.





We work with these platforms and the foundations that sponsor them.



A distributed team working with distributed technologies.

Team members are spread across multiple locations including Berlin, Buenos Aires, London, New York, Montevideo, Costa Rica and Melbourne.
